Name: Harding
Fate:
Sold 16 April 1947 and
broken up for scrap
Armament:
4 × 5 in (127 mm)/38 caliber dual purpose guns (4×1),
6 × 0.50 in (12.7 mm) machine guns,
4 × Bofors 40 mm guns (2×2),
7 × Oerlikon 20 mm cannons (7×1),
5 × 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes (5 Mark 15 torpedoes),
6 × depth charge projectors,
2 × depth charge tracks
